name: The Final FarmStead
description:
You play as a farmer trying to protect your village from evil creatures sent by a witch. Luckily, you're not alone with the help of the evil witch's sister's alchemy you can get magical plants and fertilizers to make powerful plants to fight off the creatures. The game plays as a farming sim with turn-based combat where you grow plants and have them fight at night. In the morning the plants can evolve if they have the right mix of fertilizer and growth time.

This is a game for Roguelike Jam 4
